content.text: 12 ounces chopped raw bacon
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "12 ounces chopped raw bacon" )

content.text: 1 small white onion, chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 small white onion, chopped" )

content.text: 5 button mushrooms, chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "5 button mushrooms, chopped" )

content.text: 1 1/2 pounds extra-lean ground beef
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 1/2 pounds extra-lean ground beef" )

content.text: 1 egg
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 egg" )

content.text: 1/4 cup evaporated milk
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1/4 cup evaporated milk" )

content.text: 6 ounces shredded Swiss cheese, divided
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "6 ounces shredded Swiss cheese, divided" )

content.text: 1/2 cup corn flake crumbs
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1/2 cup corn flake crumbs" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Place bacon in a skillet and cook over medium heat until the pieces are browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "bacon"@9:14 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-1-0 "a skillet"@18:27 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "cook"@32:36 / AC
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "medium heat"@42:53 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until the pieces are browned"@54:82 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Remove with a slotted spoon to paper towels.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:instrument ( tool-2-0 "a slotted spoon"@15:30 / TOOL )
		:loc ( tool-2-1 "paper towels"@34:46 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Discard all but 1 tablespoon of bacon grease.
4) Stir in onions and mushrooms, and cook until soft.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "onions"@11:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "mushrooms"@22:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "cook"@37:41 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( cond-4-0 "until soft"@42:52 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
)

content.text: 5) Remove from heat.
6) In a large bowl, stir together beef, egg, and milk.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "stir"@20:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "beef"@34:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "egg"@40:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "milk"@49:53 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Stir in the onion and mushrooms.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "the onion"@11:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "mushrooms"@25:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Mix in about 4 ounces of Swiss cheese, and all but 1 tablespoon of bacon.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "4 ounces of Swiss cheese"@16:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "all but 1 tablespoon of bacon"@46:75 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Stir in cornflake crumbs, and mix until well blended.
10) Shape into a loaf, and place in a meatloaf pan.
11) Bake in a preheated oven for 1 hour.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:loc ( tool-11-0 "a preheated oven"@12:28 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-11-0 "1 hour"@33:39 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 12) Drain fat, and sprinkle with remaining cheese and bacon.
13) Return to oven, and bake until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-13 / R
	:inform ( ac-13-0 "Return"@4:10 / AC
		:loc ( tool-13-0 "oven"@14:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-13-1 "bake"@24:28 / AC
		:until ( cond-13-0 "until cheese is melted"@29:51 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-13-0 "5 minutes"@59:68 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
